p: The essential oil composition of all Callistemon species in different seasons exhibited common major constituents as eucalyptol, α-terpineol and α-pinene, which make their discrimination a major obstacle. By applying metabolomics fingerprinting in combination with chemometric analysis, such as PCA and HCA, this problem could be solved and was helpful to identify the plants as it does not only rely on major components, but takes into consideration all metabolic profiling [ 27].
